ai.summary: Geraldine's Walk at Ickworth is a short, easy 1.6 km stroll through the grounds of the Ickworth Estate in the UK. The route is suitable for all ages and fitness levels, offering relaxed views of parkland and estate scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat or gently rolling terrain with well-maintained gravel and grassy paths. Some shaded sections near the estate grounds; surfaces may be muddy after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear suitable for uneven or damp surfaces. Stay on marked paths and respect private property and wildlife. Check estate opening hours before visiting. Bring water and keep children and dogs under control. In case of emergencies, carry a charged mobile phone and know the nearest exit points.
recommended_gear: Map or smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: All year, with spring and autumn offering especially pleasant scenery and milder temperatures.

seo.meta_description: Explore Geraldine's Walk at Ickworth Estate in the United Kingdom. A short, easy 1.6 km route through parkland with flat terrain, practical safety tips, and gear recommendations.
